Summary: Blimp-like with a queer "alien" angularity, enormous, battleship gray
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Baltimore
There were no other sightings in Baltimore on or around February 28th 2005
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving with my wife down Baltimore City's Jones Falls Expressway leading south toward downtown into the city when I spotted this enormous ship in the sky over downtown. Thinking it might possibly be a blimp the overall aspect of which I was somehow misreading, I studied it hard until I could rule out, to my own satisfaction, any chance of it being a conventional craft. More than anything, it resembled a featureless aircraft carrier in the sky -- one with a superstructure and angularity that brought the word "alien" to mind, Moreover, it had a "there -- not there" quality I find difficult to describe. I asked my wife to verify my impression, but found her to be antagonistic about doing so -- as if inexplicably angry at the thing and the entire episode. Nevertheless -- she allowed that it was bizarre and inexplicable. Sometime after this, I emailed Bill Bean, a local UFO watcher and learned that he had witnessed it as well.
